p: Firstly, in order to explore the electrocatalytic properties of the N-doped graphene towards ORR, cyclic voltammetry (CV) measurements have been performed in N 2- or O 2-saturated 1M NaOH solutions at a scan rate of 50 mV/s using the N-doped graphene/glassy carbon (GC) modified electrodes; for comparison, the 10 wt.% Pt/C modified GC has been prepared and tested towards ORR in alkaline medium ( Figure 6).
